Comment: Come on guys you have to think long term!  Just think of all the money that will trickle down from deporting [2 year old](https://www.politico.com/news/2025/04/25/us-citizen-deportation-donald-trump-00311631) children, [children with cancer](https://www.rollingstone.com/politics/politics-news/trump-deport-child-cancer-us-citizen-1235325778/), and in [making sure trans kids don't get to play sport](https://www.hrc.org/press-releases/donald-trump-takes-aim-at-student-athletes-continues-obsession-with-attacking-lgbtq-youth).   Revenues are already pouring in now that the *Gulf of Mexico* (a name originating from 1550) has been changed to the *Gulf of America*. This is huge for the cartography industry!  Measles had been considered eliminated in the U.S. way back in 2000 thanks to the highly effective MMR vaccine but this was a drag on the economy. With dozens of new outbreaks spreading and [children dying from the preventable disease](https://www.texastribune.org/2025/04/06/measles-texas-outbreak-death-unvaccinated/) there's finally growth in the small coffin sector. An industry which had been struggling under the Democrats.  Barely the tip of the ice berg, there have been over 130 executive orders directly helping American consumers.   The [Smithsonian museum can't mention slavery](https://www.federalregister.gov/documents/2025/04/03/2025-05838/restoring-truth-and-sanity-to-american-history), there's a new [task force on the 2026 FIFA World Cup](https://www.federalregister.gov/documents/2025/03/12/2025-04102/establishing-the-white-house-task-force-on-the-fifa-world-cup-2026), and the US will [leave the UN Human Rights Council, UNESCO](https://www.federalregister.gov/documents/2025/02/10/2025-02504/withdrawing-the-united-states-from-and-ending-funding-to-certain-united-nations-organizations-and), and the [World Health Organization](https://www.federalregister.gov/documents/2025/01/29/2025-01957/withdrawing-the-united-states-from-the-world-health-organization).  Each and every order meticulously crafted by the finest minds in America in service of raising wages for all and slashing inflation.  **/s**
